issues.message: IndentationError: unexpected indent - assert statement incorrectly indented
issues.fix: Reduce indentation to align with proper block level (FIXED)

issues.message: Missing exports for GreenLangClient, WorkflowBuilder, AgentBuilder causing ImportError in tests
issues.fix: Add imports and exports for missing classes (FIXED)

issues.message: F401: Multiple unused imports (MagicMock, patch, json, jwt, etc.)
issues.fix: Remove unused imports or add # noqa: F401 if intentionally kept

issues.message: E128: 17 instances of continuation line under-indented
Coverage at 9.43%, far below 85% DoD requirement
issues.fix: Implement missing agent methods, convert scripts to tests, add comprehensive test coverage

summary: Critical issues fixed to make tests runnable, but significant work remains. Main blockers: 1) IndentationError (FIXED), 2) Import errors from missing SDK exports (FIXED), 3) Missing package init files (FIXED). Remaining issues: extensive linting violations (100+ warnings), extremely low test coverage (9.43% vs 85% required). The codebase needs systematic cleanup of whitespace issues, unused imports, and major test coverage improvements to meet DoD requirements.
